snippet: Students waiting for a bus at a military academy were killed by a roadside bomb on Wednesday in what appeared to be the latest in a series of attacks by militant groups.
abstract: Bomb blast in Kafr el-Sheikh, Egypt, kills three military academy students in what appears to be latest attack by militants on security forces.
lead_paragraph: Students waiting for a bus at a military academy were killed by a roadside bomb on Wednesday in what appeared to be the latest in a series of attacks by militant groups.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Blast Kills Military Cadets
